reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan stylish, with gold buttons that look great and create a professional appearance.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm and attractive sweater
items.body: This is a very nice sweater and a small fit me perfectly (weight: 120 - height 5'5"). It feels soft, cozy, and warm, not to mention very comfortable and looks high quality. It can be worn over a blouse or by itself and either way it looks great. The only downside is the buttons are cheap plastic bit at least they can be easily replaced. The pockets are perfect for a large cell phone. I'm so glad I bought this one. Read more
items.author: Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater!
items.body: I am so glad I ordered this sweater! It was on sale and I was a bit concerned with quality given the price, but it was SO worth it! The fit is very flattering, and the gold buttons give it style and some color contrast. The photo is accurate as far as the length of the sweater. I am very pleased with the quality, style, and price of this sweater. I washed it on a gentle cold water cycle and dried it on a low setting for a few minutes, and then allowed it to air dry the rest of the way. It came out perfect. At below $20, it was a great bargain! Read more
items.author: NJGirl

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good wuality
items.body: The quality of this was unexpected. It’s not thin and cheap. It has some weight to it, which is nice. The buttons are cute and elegant. I am only giving a four because I thought the brown would be more chocolate, but it’s like more camel. I still like the color though. Read more
items.author: Emily Violet Davey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wore this on repeat
items.body: When I was packing to go to 45 degree Paris from 75 degree Delray Beach, I needed more layers. I bought this sweatery soft Chanel looking boxy jacket in a teal blue that goes with my entire color palate. I did not wear any of the 3 fine gauge cardigans I brought with me. Instead i felt stylish and warm in my new sweater jacket. I layered it over 3/4 sleeve tees and under a teal and gold pashmina and a purplish rain coat. I was cozy and comfy. The size was true and I have not (yet) experienced pilling. Read more
items.author: Ro

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, super soft, true to size
items.body: I was very impressed with the quality and fit of this sweater. Very soft perfect fit I am 5"2' weigh 150 and XL fit me perfect. Colors are beautiful I ordered 2 while they were on a flash sale the dark blue and dark green colors were as shown in pic. Very versitile for dressy or casual. I will be buying more in the future. Read more
items.author: goldendk

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down
items.body: Very comfortable and soft but the shape was very boxy and unflattering and ran larger. Size down Read more
items.author: Britney Tallman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Love the sweater.. warm and pretty Read more
items.author: Cindy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater to dress up or down.
items.body: Comfy sweater. Plenty of thickness without being too bulky. Warm enough for layering. Boxy fit. Runs a little bit big. Cute button detail. Read more
items.author: Maria S. Colontonio

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Dark Khaki, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Mist Blue, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
